data.text: @NextLAMayor California will always be in a state of emergency with Newsom.
@NextLAMayor Sadly, those of us stuck in Los Angeles will still be under the thumb of tyrants
@hamill_law @NextLAMayor Agree. The message from la times says AFTER 3/11 which does not exactly mean 3/12. Don’t be fooled people this is a bull sh1t announcement.

@GenExerMama @NextLAMayor I can't work again until I can send my speech-delayed child to school without masks. Until then I am homeschooling. California families are counting on @GavinNewsom to do the right thing.
@hamill_law @NextLAMayor My decision to put my almost-two year old into daycare hinges on this.
@NextLAMayor He's sending shadow Ghaly out to do the dirty work today, so the toddlers will experience at least 6 more weeks of Winter of Death in California.
@NextLAMayor I’m curious how they spin “progressive California “ being one of the last states in the entire country to mask Children. Even New York has given up
